title: 'Step Up' for Refugees (with Duncan Baker MP)
itunes:title: 'Step Up' for Refugees (with Duncan Baker MP)
description:
The U.K. needs to show strong leadership in its support for Ukrainian refugees, says Duncan Baker, Conservative MP for North Norfolk. He tells Bloomberg Westminster's Yuan Potts that in Vladimir Putin, governments are dealing with an individual who doesn't play by the rules. Plus: Sonia Sceats, Chief Executive of Freedom from Torture on what Britain needs to do to help those fleeing Ukraine. She says the response so far has been 'woefully inadequate.'

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
